minecraft:particle_lifetime_expression.expiration_expression: !(t.show_wrong_block_overlay ?? false)? { t.show_wrong_block_overlay = true; t.wrong_block_x = v.x; t.wrong_block_y = v.y; t.wrong_block_z = v.z; }; return v.kill_particles;

set_wrong_block_overlay_position.expression: t.show_wrong_block_overlay = true; t.wrong_block_x = v.x; t.wrong_block_y = v.y; t.wrong_block_z = v.z;

clear_wrong_block_overlay.expression: v.x == t.wrong_block_x && v.y == t.wrong_block_y && v.z == t.wrong_block_z? { t.show_wrong_block_overlay = false; }; t.wrong_blocks = (t.wrong_blocks ?? 0) - 1;
